hero.title: Hey, I'm
hero.description: I believe in God and the abilities He gave me to make your next website
hero.text: Ruben White is a highly skilled Frontend Developer.

skills.label: Skills
skills.description: I have extensive experience in building websites and implementing functionalities using no-code or low-code solutions, as well as advanced development technologies.

works.label: Works
works.description: Here are some freelance missions, personal, and side projects. In waiting for a the full list on the Portfolio page, you can

work1.title: Mangaverse
work1.description: The purpose of the Mangaverse is to find in a single search all any manga you're looking for.

work2.title: Bandage E-commerce
work2.description: Translating Figma mockup into a pixelperfect website. Then improved UX with lazyload, animations...

work3.title: Shopify App
work3.description: Custom app development for Shopify store owner.

work4.title: Bunny Management
work4.description: Design of a bunny management platform. This project aim to assist the breeder in his daily tasks, prevent viruses and enable a owner to monitor the farm from anywhere

works.videoError: Your browser does not support the video tag.

techs.label: Technologies
techs.description: These are the technologies I use, I mean, those I love and master the most.

part1.title: The Beginning
part1.p1-b: 5 years ago in Python. With my electronist background, I spent the first year focused on robotics using cards like Arduino.
part1.p2: I later learned Python in-depth and web development basics at school.
part1.p3: Reflecting on my journey, I‚Äôve explored many technologies but ultimately found my passion in frontend development and web design.

part2.title: Transition
part2.p1: As most of developers, I started the journey looking towards the freedom web jobs offer. Later, I tasted the professional life of this job, It wasn't so bad, but as a full stack developer, or a ..."backend", I could have stop ways ago.
part2.p2: Over my last two roles, I decided to specialize myself in Frontend development. It aligns perfectly with my strengths, boosts my productivity, and often brings the peace you feel when you're doing the thing God designed you for. At that time I also started receiving freelance missions, and freelance and freedom sound good together right?

part4.title: Waiting for You!
part4.p1: Here we are ! First, I thank you to have read me, it's a pleasure to know the text wroten in my editor's dark mode made some light in your eyes
part4.p2: Maybe you're my next partner, we may have a rich journey together were I can learn a ton of new things and use them to make you a banger website !
part4.p3: Why not send me a message? Me, I can't wait to see you.
